reviews.review: Mid by Daylight has become Peak by Daylight
good game, beware of hook campers tho
I've been playing this game for around 3 years now(maybe 4) and I still love it.

The patch 6.1.0 announcement was the most exciting news for the game since I first started playing back in Dec 2018.  Now that I've had an opportunity to try the official release, I can best describe it as: five steps forward, ten steps back.  Full disclosure, I almost exclusively play survivor.

[b]Some good...[/b]

Reading the notes prior to the update I was excited.  BHVR does seem to care about taking an objective view of the meta.  Their usage of objective data to nerf the top picked perksâ€”or rework them in to the base kit so as to no longer necessitate their usage, like Borrowed Timeâ€”was and still is an awesome idea I wish more devs would pick up on.

The changes to perks like Lightweight, Hope, No One Left Behind, (to name a few) increases the viable perk options.  Taking old content and breathing new life into it while shaking up the meta like this is smart.

Decreasing the time it takes to trigger the two upper tiers of bloodlust is sensible, the change does not impact the majority of chases, only those where a survivor thoroughly utilizes loops.

"Conspicuous Actions" and the accompanying change to how endurance functions removes certain buffs when the chase is over, and the player no longer needs them.

Removing the bloodpoint multipliers from many perks nullifies overall player progression as a factor in play style.  Now perks are only relevant for what they give you [i]in[/i] matches, not outside of them.

Both changes to Ruin are nice.  The perk use to be a win condition if the totem was placed well and the killer was competent.  Negating the perk once one survivor dies allows the other three a chance to actually win in that case.

The changes to progression/prestige, and the addition of matchmaking incentives help keep the meta-game healthy.

[b]...but mostly bad[/b]

Iron Will may as well not exist.  Some survivors are [i]much[/i] louder than others (running Jeff or Bill is a handicap), and I [i]do[/i] notice that I can't break chases any more unless the killer decides to quit.  Keep the exhausted part of the nerf, just drop the 25% noise nerf.

Increasing the time it takes to repair gens, and increasing gen progress loss, and increasing gen kick speed, and buffing Eruption/Jolt all in the same patch is a recipe for over-correction.  Yes, it used to be too easy to gen rush, and at least a quarter of my pre-6.1.0 games I'd escape without being chased once.  Now, they have veered too far in the other direction.  The most demoralizing thing in the world is seeing how easily your progress on a gen evaporates, especially when there are so many perks in the game that block gens or kill progress.

Was survivor speed boost when hit really an issue?  Why does Calm Spirit need to come with a speed debuff now?

I've yet to win a single game against a Thanatophobia Legion.  That combo is a 4k, decided before the game even starts.  Generator nerfs with that killer and perk is gg.

Prior to this patch I escaped at least half, probably over 60% of my matches.  Now it's much closer to half that.  Nobody wants to leave their gens to go get people off the hook cause they take so long to do, and progress means nothing until it's 100%.  Gens are so insurmountable now it isn't fun.  It's so bad that killer mains are complaining about queue times.
Seems like a good idea. It is never a good idea. Don't touch this game. You'll get mad at others or they'll flame you

I love this game I really do but I just wanna say sometimes playing killer is a bit difficult. All of the good killer perks got nerffed so please make some new killer perks to help with gen speed. Gens go way to fast.  90 seconds helps a little but we also need maps worked on. Less loops for survivors to run.. I love this game we just need some new killer perks. Some good strong ones please. Also make perks easier to get it's still hard to achieve the perks we need. We have to P-3 every killer and it still takes forever...

Best.
 T

Played it a lot on ps4 a while ago and got into it on pc again. I have to say if you get into the game newly now youre gonna have a hard time as a lot of people have extremely good perks that make it really hard to play against them. I wouldn't say its to the extent of destroying the experience though. Fuck the nurse, honestly just fuck her. It takes a long time to find a killer round right now and some killers just camp at the hook, fuck those people too. Overall the game is pretty fun, especially if you know the movies some killers come from or you just like getting sniped by deathslinger across the whole fucking map. The hag won't ever not make me jump out of my chair because apparently I'm blind as fucking hell oh and the Oni feels like im controlling with a fucking dildo. I have far more fun in this game than i should but some killers just get on my nerves, especially since i dont play 24/7 and buy every fucking DLC to get a kit more broken than the relationship of a married redneck couple in Texas.

10/10, fuck the nurse though

You will hate this game. You will rage quit, threaten to uninstall it. But you will keep playing it. I don't know why this happens, but believe me, this game is like getting married. Extremely tricky to get out of.
The game of finding a killer match takes too long 10-15 minutes to find a match no matter what rank

Depending on your tastes, this game can be a blast. Due to the amount of optional DLCs, it can be a but frustrating but you don't need all of them to have fun. As a matter of fact, you don't even need the DLCs. The game in of itself is fun. Sometimes it can be a bit buggy but the devs usually patch bugs up pretty fast. My final personal rating: 9/10. Would reccomend.

After a recent update, most of the garbage from the game community violently took itself out, or, well, tried to pretend. Now I definitely recommend it.

The developers of this game will never be happy with players having fun or survivors being able to survive matches with the killer. They repeatedly will always gut survivors to be unplayable against killers. When you think they finally won't do it, they do it again. Just do yourself a favor and don't play the game.

Ich habe das Spiel seit Anfang an und mit einer groÃŸen Pause, gerade in der letzten Zeit viel gespielt. Vor dem Update war es schon schwer als Solo Survivor Ã¼berleben. Das Balancing quasi nicht vorhanden. Ich habe groÃŸe Hoffnung auf das Update gehabt. Aber leider wurde es statt besser noch schlimmer. Die Killer wurden gestÃ¤rkt und die MÃ¶glichkeit zu entkommen liegen bei ca. 20%. Und dann meist auch nur, weil der Killer eine absolute Niete ist und meist nicht mehr richtig spielt. Sobald die ersten Minuten nicht richtig laufen verlassen die Mates die Runde oder lassen sich sterben. Und ich bin ehrlich, ich kann es verstehen. Es wird gecampt, gesluggt und getunnelt wie lange nicht mehr. Die Killer sind gefÃ¼hlt immer dieselben. Einige Runden sind pure Zeitverschwendung, da diese 20-30 Minuten  dank der PerkÃ¤nderungen dauern. 
Selbst groÃŸe Streamer wenden sich so langsam von diesem Spiel ab. Nach 6 Jahren das Spiel so zu versauen ist schon Wahnsinn.....

Me dan risa como lloran los main survivor por los tremendos nerfeos que se comieron jajajajjajajaj seguramente solo eran chungo-dependientes, ya que el meta cambia chicos, en todas las partidas de killer, tocaba DS, CHUNGO, TIEMPO PRESTADO y una perk a gusto, pero claro, les sacaron todos sus truquitos y como no saben jugar y loopear, vienen a llorarle a los devs para que les devuelvan los antiguos survivors op jajajajjajajaj que risa amigo lpm, por fin se acabÃ³ la supremacia survivor, ahora si estan ambos bandos igualados (tampoco para tanto, estamos hablando de Behaviour).

PD: si sos un survivor lloron, descargate conmigo en los comentarios y no le dejes una reseÃ±a negativa al juego por culpa de tu falta de habilidad, un saludo :P

I'm done with this game. Not to say that means there was 2000hrs of enjoyable content for me there. This game has shifted and evolved plenty of times over the years, and in it's current state, it's hot garbage.

I have been playing this game for 7 years now we need a new damn game mode i'm so tired of the classic 1v4 I want a different game mode new characters are cool and fun but the game mode has stayed the same since the release.
ds sucks dont use dead hard and uhhhhhh bubba players r poop

The gameplay loop can be incredibly addicting in this game. It can also be incredibly frustrating and repetitive at times. The game has a steep learning curve, and takes a while to properly "have fun with". The experience of playing survivor is greatly improved by having friends. The constant addition of new content on a regular basis is another reason for a lot of people to keep returning to play more of the game, especially those who are horror fans, due to the amount of licenses the game holds, from Halloween to Attack on Titan.
